name: MugglewithaMic
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Friends discussing movies, television, video games, board games and anything else that pops into our heads. From Harry Potter and Star Wars to Xbox and Milton Bradley ... we cover it all! This is all about fun, so we hope you enjoy!

Follow us on Facebook and Instagram for info on upcoming and past episodes!
